    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs=""
>
[Hag Eye](/Equipment.aspx?ID=935)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
<trait label="Scrying" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=141" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 128</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This item appears to be an ordinary semiprecious stone and is typically mounted on a brooch or ring, but the stone is, in fact, an eyeball. This illusion can be seen through with [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) or similar magic, and anyone who interacts with the item feels its wet and sticky surface, allowing them to attempt to [disbelieve](/Rules.aspx?ID=267) the illusion (DC 19). Many hags claim a _hag eye_ is more effective if plucked from a living, awake creature, but this is likely just a convenient excuse for sadism.

 The _hag eye_ produces no direct benefit for the wearer, but allows the [hag](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=59) who created it, or any member of her coven, can peer through the eye using the [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) action. This has no range limit, provided the hag is on the same plane.

 Any damage dealt to the eye destroys it. If this happens while a hag is looking through it, the hag is [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) for 1 hour.

**Craft Requirements** You must be a hag.

>
Hag Eye (Oracular)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #182: Graveclaw](/Sources.aspx?ID=143) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 75 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

_Oracular hag eyes_ are made with the eye of a [cyclops](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=25). A hag who casts [_augury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=15) with an _oracular hag eye_ in her possession reduces the DC of the secret flat check to 2.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 8"
pfs=""
>
Hag Eye (Smokey)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #182: Graveclaw](/Sources.aspx?ID=143) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 450 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

</column>

---

A _smoky hag eye_ is named after the black vapor that constantly emanates from it, like the smoke that continually seeps from a [bodak's](/Monsters.aspx?ID=573) eye.

</title>

</traits>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

</column>

---

A _stony hag eye_ is fashioned from the eye of a creature, such a [basilisk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=44) or [medusa](/Monsters.aspx?ID=297), with a petrifying gaze.
